cause.description:
Aleah Martin was my 15th year old little sister who died May 2, 2005 from a house fire. This memorial fund is to honor her and continue her legacy by raising money to help the victims of house fires as well as the people who may have lose family members due to fire in the Philadelphia area.
1. To continue the legacy of Aleah D. Martin.
2. To raise money for victims of house fires.
3. To raise money for people who have lose family member due to fire.
4. To spread awareness of the dangers of Fire
5. To support those who have lose someone due to fire.
cause.mission: To raise money for victims of house fires and their families in the Philadelphia area.
cause.name: Aleah D. Martin Memorial Fund
